title: Hindi Website ‘Only News 24X7’ Uses Video From Pak to Stir Bigotry
subtitle: In the video, a woman asks ‘India ka Baap Kaun?’ to which a group of men reply ‘Pakistan, Pakistan’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A viral video on WhatsApp by a little known Hindi news website ‘Only News 24×7’ claims that a school teacher in India chanted ‘India ka baap kaun? Pakistan, Pakistan.’

In a dramatic fashion, anchor Neha Singh calls upon viewers to forward the video to at least ten WhatsApp groups so that it reaches Prime Minister Narendra Modi as well.

[We are using screenshots and not the original video due to the sensitive nature of the content.]
